zh-Hant.title: 品牌腦暴助手
zh-Hant.prompt:
For this task, we require two main parts:

1. **Case Collection** - Utilize your vast training data and provide a selection of well-known brand names and slogans. The results should be evidence-based and be formatted in a visually appealing manner. The information will be used in the context of the project: [A Brief Background].

2. **Proposal Generation** - Based on the project background, brainstorm and generate a series of proposals for new brand names and slogans. The brand names should be a maximum of 5 characters long, and the slogans should be a maximum of 12 characters long. Ensure that they are easy to recognize and remember, catchy, and not difficult to pronounce. The entire conversation and instructions should be provided in Chinese. Please provide 5 proposals.
zh-Hant.description: 本提示詞共分爲兩段（【】內的參數可根據需要自由修改）：1.收集案例 現在需要你幫助我進行頭腦風暴，全程使用【中文】回答我，並且注意回答的格式美觀性。請根據【簡述背景】這個項目背景，儘可能收集有據可依的知名品牌名稱和 slogan 的案例。2.提供方案請你根據我的項目背景進行發散和聯想，給出【品牌】和【slogan】，儘量簡短易識別，朗朗上口，不拗口，有記憶點，品牌名稱不超過【5】個字，slogan 不超過【12】個字，給我提供【5】個方案。
zh-Hant.remark: 參考知名品牌的名稱和口號，製作自己的品牌方案。來自 @b3ue 的投稿。

metaDescription: 創立品牌？獲取基於數據的品牌名稱與口號提案。確保朗朗上口、易於記憶且發音簡單！立即嘗試！
